item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, November 7, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:

26. The guy who gave a negative review to Battlezone 98 Redux after playing 8k hours (204 points | 77 comments)

29. Ping Rate Clock (41 points | 4 comments)
